title: Account Recovery Ticket
body: I sent in my account recovery ticket for my main account since it was hacked my some rude people. And it was Sunday when I sent it in and still haven't gotten a reply :(

replies.body: I tried to look into this for you but was unable to locate a ticket.  Did you have a ticket number of another summoner name this was in regards to?  I'm happy to check on this for you!

Yes the summoner name is Teemonator 
Thanks for contacting our Player Support Team! We received your request (#23468337)

Thanks for the info!  I've confirmed your ticket has been received successfully.  It's been escalated to our account team who will be reviewing this and helping you out individually.  Until you receive a response, it's important not to reply to the ticket as that can bump you to the bottom of that queue.  They will respond asap!
Were you able to get anything?
:( sigh no one can help me
